Explanations about Options.--remote-send(C): The edit command within the program should then be: "vim --servername somename --remote-send ':tabe %s<cr>'", assuming "%s" is replaced by the filename to edit.
Explanations about Options.--remote-send(M): Connect to a Vim server and send {keys} to it.
Explanations about Options.--servername(M):
Use {name} as the server name. Used for the current Vim, unless used with a
 --remote argument, then it's the name of the server to connect to.
Explanations about Options.--version(C): To check this type: "vim --version | grep clipboard".
